CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL( Status__c , "Draft"), IMAGE("servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=015M0000000fV9l", "Yellow Circle"), IF(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Submit"), IMAGE("servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=015M0000000lFht", "Green Circle"), IMAGE("servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=015M0000000fV9l", "Yellow Circle")))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Yellow = Not yet submitted; Green = Submitted.
CustomField.label: Visual Status
